infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Style Oracle needs camera access to capture your amazing outfits and provide instant style suggestions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Style Oracle needs photo library access to analyze your wardrobe and create perfect outfit combinations.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Style Oracle needs microphone access for voice notes and outfit feedback.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Style Oracle uses location to provide weather-appropriate outfit suggestions.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Style Oracle to access your camera to take photos of your clothes.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Style Oracle to use your location for weather-based outfit suggestions.
